backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister handling user profiles, product catalog CRUD with admin authorization, and Stripe checkout/session integration.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing implemented features, linked source files, components, and confidence annotations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the roles of various frontend React components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for storefront, cart, payment, and admin pages wrapped in a ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Component that restricts access to children based on admin status, showing alerts for unauthenticated or unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and basic error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting firstâ€‘time users to enter a name and saving it to the backend.
frontend/src/components/layout/StoreLayo: Main store layout with header, cart indicator, admin link, profile greeting, footer, and conditional profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/store/ProductCar: Displays a product with image, details, price, and an add-to-cart button with detail navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity state and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query wrappers for product, user profile, admin, Stripe, and mutation operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging and currency formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin landing page linking to product management and Stripe payment settings.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Provides CRUD UI for products, including creation, editing, deletion, and image upload handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminStripeSetu: Allows admins to configure Stripe secret keys and allowed countries, showing current configuration status.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page with item management, total price display, and Stripe checkout session creation.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Page shown on failed or canceled payments with navigation options back to cart or shopping.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays a success message after Stripe payment and clears the cart when the session is completed.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product information with quantity controls and allows adding the item to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Fetches and displays a product grid with options to view details or add items to the cart.
frontend/src/state/cart.ts: Zustand store managing cart items with add, remove, update, clear, and total calculation functions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests for a store clone with Stripe and admin functionality.
